email_body:
Dear AVians,
 
We are shaping up a superb data science ecosystem brick by brick. The community is thriving with events and interactions. I can see a new world where data science knowledge is getting created through our community interactions.
 
Our entire team extremely excited about our first annual conference - DataHack Summit 2017. The conference is shaping up superbly - this would be first of its kind conference with hands-on practitioners sharing their knowledge, challenges and bleeding edge work. A few awesome sessions & workshops have been announced and there are many more to come. Book your early-bird spot before they finish. If you know/are a data science leader and have done really awesome work - reach out to us and we can provide you Indias largest platform for data science practitioners.
 
Now, coming to last month, I am feeling proud to announce that our dedicated volunteers now run meet up programs across 5 cities - check out our upcoming Expert Meet-ups. These meetups are meant for practitioners and are invite-only, hands-on problem-solving sessions.
 
In addition to this, you might have noticed some top notch articles on deep learning like Introduction to GANs and coding Neural Networks from scratch in R & Python.
 
We constantly bring various jobs vacancies across India - so to help you with your career beginnings/ change, keep a tab on the latest openings here.
 
So, see you all very soon in this new world emerging!
 
Regards,
 
Kunal Jain
subject: Sneak Peek: A look at the emerging data science world !

August Newsletter
 
Dear AVians,
 
We have had one of the most anticipated events of the month - Fireside Chat with DJ Patil, Former Data Scientist of the USA and I am thrilled to congratulate the whole team for putting up an excellent session as well as to those who were present there and made full out of this opportunity. If you've missed it, here's a coverage of the event for you all: Watch here. He's touched upon various important areas which I personally recommend you all should listen to!
 
And moving to our biggest event of the year - DataHack Summit 2017. On great demands, we've extended the 'early bird tickets' offer till 7th August. So, make sure you have your booking before it finishes. As we are now finalising the Workshops and sessions of the Summit (Take a look at the sessions here) - if you have a strong command over Analytics/ Data Science specific subjects or if you know someone who does, we humbly invite you to share the dais with other experts and be one of the speakers at the Summit. You can submit your interests here. 
 
Meanwhile, upgrade your skills with an excellent Beginner's guide on Tableau, D3.js, Intro. on Genetic Algorithm and many more useful topics been explained through our articles published in July. 
 
So keep up with the pace, keep pouring your suggestions for the event as well as for our daily efforts to ensure we deliver what you are looking for! Have a great month ahead!
 
Regards,
 
Kunal Jain

email_body:
Announcing Dr. Kirk Borne as Keynote Speaker
 
Principal Data Scientist & Executive Advisor at Booz Allen Hamilton
 

 
 
Hi,
 
Here is the big wrap coming up before the Early Bird ticket expires. We are delighted to announce Dr. Kirk Borne as the keynote speaker for DataHack Summit 2017. Its a great opportunity for data science professionals in India to interact with one the top worldwide influencers in big data and data science.
 
Dr. Kirk Borne is the Principal Data Scientist and Executive Advisor at Booz Allen Hamilton (since 2015).
 
He previously spent 12 years as Professor of Astrophysics and Computational Science at George Mason University where he taught and advised students in the Data Science degree programs. Before that, he worked 18 years supporting NASA projects in various roles, including Data Archive Project Scientist for the Hubble Space Telescope. He has a PhD in Astronomy from Caltech and a BS in Physics from LSU.
 
 
In addition to him, we have speakers from Kabbage, Acalvio Technologies, Paytm, Reliance Jio, Freshdesk and more joining us soon.
 
 
Early Bird Pricing expires on 07 August 2017.
 
This is your last chance to grab the tickets to the conference as we have limited seats.
subject: Dr Kirk Borne of Booz Allen Hamilton, to keynote at DataHack Summit 2017

email_body:
Machine learning algorithms are considered black-box models. However, their outputs are of immense business importance that humans need to understand and act upon. For example, if a clustering model suggests 4 customer clusters, how do we identify and characterize these? If a random forest model suggests a pattern of classification, how do we understand the dominant factors and the irrelevant ones?
 
 
Dear Enthusiasts,
 
We are announcing our new session on "Visualizing Machine Learning" at the DataHack Summit 2017 - Conference on Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning.
 
Dates:  9-11 November 2017 
Venue: MLR Convention Center, Bengaluru
 
Anand S will discuss topics that fall under the umbrella of model visualization  where the inputs, process, and output of machine learning models are the topics of understanding.
 
Speaker: Anand S is the Founder & CEO of Gramener. He has an MBA from IIM Bangalore and a B.Tech from IIT Madras.
 
Step into this session right away if you would like to explore some of the prevalent ways of visualizing machine learning models. 
 
We have limited seats available for workshops & conference. Our tickets start at INR 5000.
subject: Visualizing Machine Learning with Anand S, CEO of Gramener, at #DHS2017

email_body:
Hosted Your Corporate Hackathon Yet?
 
 
Do You Know???
 
9 out of 10 Fortune 500 companies in the past five decades are gone. The few companies which survived have only one thing in common - INNOVATION
 
Today, innovation is the key driver for businesses to survive and grow. The best companies crowd-source innovation through hackathons. Hackathons are a game changer in the way organisations create new products, solve data driven business challenges, hire the best talent and augment their brand image. 
 
Read further to understand how hackathons can add value to your business:
 
 
 
Solve Complex Business Problems
 
Get creative solutions from a pool of the most talented data scientists and analytics professionals. Whether you want to tackle issues related to customer acquisition, cost reduction, logistics optimization, marketing effectiveness; Hackathon solves all data-driven business problems. Know more about how to conduct a crowd sourcing Hackathon.
 
 
 
Hire the best Analytics Professionals
 
Going through rounds of interviews and still not able to find the right candidate? Recruiting through hiring hackathons is the best way to hire in lesser time and minimize the hiring cost. Know more about how to hire the best data scientists and analytics professionals through hiring hackathons.
 
 
 
Create an impact in the Data Science World
 
Elevate your brand image and take it to a whole new level of recognition with Branding Hackathons. Showcase your new products, services or apps amongst the largest Tech Community through hackathons. Learn more about Branding Hackathons. 
 
 
Let's start planning a hackathon right away!
 
 
Host Your First Hackathon
 
 
Analytics Vidhya is a knowledge-based community for Analytics and Data Science. It is India's largest data science community and second largest globally. It attracts more than 1.3 million visits monthly from data science evangelists, analytics and data science professionals, freshers and students across the world.

October Newsletter
 
Dear AVians,
 
Our flagship Data Science event - DataHack Summit 2017 is just round the corner. All the hard work put in till now is coming together. DataHack Summit is an unique event focused on practitioners, data science leaders and practical knowledge sharing. 
 
We are thrilled to announce 10 Hack Sessions at the conference. Each Hack Session would be 1 hour session, where live problems will be solved by an expert. The hack sessions are being crafted with the same rigour which we put in our articles and tutorials. Some of the hack sessions include Deploying Machine Learning Models, Sentiment analysis, Automated Machine Learning using MLBox.

We have last few tickets for the workshops announced previously. Looking at this awesome response, we are announcing 2 more workshops - Deep Learning using TensorFlow and Natural Language Processing (NLP) from Scratch. Each of these workshops will happen on 11th November 2017 and are 8 hour long.

To provide students a chance to win tickets to DataHack Summit 2017, we have The Ultimate Student Hunt 2017 coming up. Click Prediction Hackathon, is underway, so keep your eyes rolling and brain working!

We are very eager to meet you all at the Summit and making this event reach the potential that our community has to offer! See you soon!
subject: [October 2017] - Just a month to go! DataHack Summit 2017

Dear Patron,
 
Analytics Vidhya is on a mission  to create next generation of data scientists in India. With this aim, we are announcing DataHack Summit 2017 - India's largest conference for data science practitioners. Here is what is happening at the summit: 
 
30+ Talks: Attend talks by industry leaders on real-life case studies and get latest on applications of Data Science in domains like Telecom, Fintech, Cyber Security, Healthcare and much more. 
 
10+ Hack Sessions: Live-problem solving by experts! Get to know the cutting-edge tools like spark, tensorflow and techniques like deep learning, image processing, natural language processing and upskill yourself in 1-hour sessions.
 
3+ Workshops: Dont just cram it, get a hands-on overview of seemingly demanding topics like machine learning and deep learning! There is an entire day devoted to machine learning workshops.
 
3+ Networking Sessions: Meet experienced and like-minded people to network with them. You will also have an opportunity to a one-on-one contact with thought leaders in the industry.

email_body:
December Newsletter
 
Dear AVians,
 
A BIG Thank You to all of you - DataHack Summit 2017 was a huge success. We got 800 data science professionals including industry thought leaders at the venue. The feedback and the enthusiasm for the Summit was unparalleled to any other event I have ever seen.

With this awesome feedback from community and incessant demand / requests from Mumbai and Pune - we decided to do DataFest 2018, Mumbai. The occasion will also mark 5 year Anniversary for Analytics Vidhya - we are already getting excited for this. For more details, please subscribe to the updates for DataFest 2018, Mumbai. We will share more details with you shortly.

November also saw 3 very exciting hackathons - McKinsey Online Analytics Hackathon, Cross Sell: target the right customer and Churn Prediction. We have a series of hackathons coming up all the way through new year, so see you all competing for these exciting challenges. We also continued to publish high quality articles on subjects like FlashText, Docker, Information Retrieval, non-parametric statistical tests and heart sound segmentation. Do read them in case you have missed any of them.

With 2018 just round the corner, we are working on some exciting updates. You should start hearing about them from us shortly. Till then, stay warm and keep learning

Regards,
Kunal Jain

January 2018 Newsletter
 
Dear AVians,
 
First of all, wishing you all a very Happy New and Prosperous Year ahead. In a lot of ways - 2017 was the year when we started dreaming big. Our traffic continued to grow month on month - thanks to your support and constant encouragement. We successfully delivered one of the most exciting events in India - DataHack Summit 2017 and DataFest 2017. We also conducted several successful hackathons for our clients and community members.
 
If 2017 was exciting - we promise 2018 is going to be even more exciting. We announced DataFest 2018, coming up in Mumbai. More details about the same will be coming up shortly. It is going to be raining hackathons and competitions.
 
The year kicks off with upcoming Mckinsey Analytics Online Hackathon - Sales Excellence to win an all-expenses-paid trip to an international analytics conference of your choice as a McKinsey guest! And get a chance to interview with Analytics Vidhya at our Hiring Hackathon. Just don't miss this opportunity!
 
On the learning front, make sure you dont miss out on compilations of our most read articles from 2017 on Deep Learning and Machine Learning. We've also published a simplified Introduction to Altair and Long Short Term Memory, amongst many other informative articles of your interests.
 
I would also want to hear from you - what do you want to see from Analytics Vidhya in 2018? Feel free to reply to this email or reach out to me directly and we will be happy to talk to you.

Stay warm and keep learning through 2018! All the best.

Regards,
Kunal

email_body:
Searching For Top Data Scientists To Join Your Organization?

 
Analytics Vidhya is serving companies across the country to help recruit the best talent and build a world-class data science team. Our industry knowledge and data science expertise enable us to find the best candidates from the industry suited for your requirements.
 
 
Ready to hire the best data scientists? Leave a message and we will get in touch.

Felicity : Kings of Machine Learning
 
Dear AVian,
 
Times are changing, and AI is the future. Do not make the mistake of considering this as just another coding contest. So gear up with all your statistics, machine learning, data mining tools and most importantly, your intuition, to beat the rest and become the "King of Machine Learning".
 
IIIT Hydrabad in association with Analytics Vidhya has come up with "Kings Of Machine Learning" ; a machine learning hackathon for all Machine Learning evangelists who can showcase thier problem solving ability to the world.
 
Date: 25 January to 31 January, 2018
 
Time: 00:00 hrs (IST) 
 
Prizes: First prize : INR 7000
Second prize : INR 5000
Third prize : INR 3000
 
The top 10 scorers will receive a honorary Kings of ML T-Shirt.

What are you waiting for? Register here.

email_body:
February 2018 Newsletter
 
Dear AVian,

We couldnt have asked for a better start to 2018. By any metric - January 2018 has been a dream month. Be it traffic, new users, community activities or community impact - January has been bigger than any month before.
 
We started publishing AVbytes - concise industry news delivered to you on a regular basis (Subscribe here). We also published the Ultimate path to become a data scientist in 2018 - check it out for a step by step learning plan crafted by our experts.

We hosted some awesome contests in January and February is looking even more exciting. Check out the AB-InBev Hiring hackathons for Data Scientists and Data Engineers, Numerolysis Blogathon by NMIMS-Hyderabad and two new practice problems on Twitter Sentiment Analysis and Recommendation Engine.
 
In addition, we published some awesome content which includes interesting guide on Building a FAQ Chatbots, Introduction to ANOVA, Factorization Machines & their application on huge datasets, Tableau Guide amongst many other informative articles of your interests.

If you are feeling an overload of super awesome activities - you need to make it an habit ?? Why? Because, we are building next generation data science ecosystem and there is lot more coming your way in 2018.

Regards,
Kunal
 
 
Articles
 
 
The Ultimate Learning Path to Becoming a Data Scientist in 2018
The Ultimate Learning Path to Becoming a Data Scientist in 2018
 
Make most of 2018 now! Here's your learning path to learn Data Science & pursue career as Data Scientist in most structured way.
 
 
10 Data Science, Machine Learning and AI Podcasts You Must Listen To
10 Data Science, Machine Learning and AI Podcasts You Must Listen To
 
Stay updated with these recommended 10 Data Science, Machine Learning and AI Podcasts you must listen to.
 
 
A Collection of 10 Data Visualizations You Must See
A Collection of 10 Data Visualizations You Must See
 
Some of the best data visualizations been created using tools like Python, R, Tableau among others - alongwith their source codes. 
 
 
10 Audio Processing Tasks to get you started with Deep Learning Applications (with Case Studies)
10 Audio Processing Tasks to get you started with Deep Learning Applications (with Case Studies)
 
Getting started with audio processing? Here's a curated list of tasks that you must get your hands on, when solving audio processing problems. Well explained using case studies.
 
 
Building a FAQ Chatbot in Python  The Future of Information Searching
Building a FAQ Chatbot in Python  The Future of Information Searching
 
Are you interested to learn building Chatbots for answering queries? This guide demonstrates exactly the same, in Python.
 
 
A Beginners Guide to Channel Attribution Modeling in Marketing (using Markov Chains, with a case study in R)
A Beginners Guide to Channel Attribution Modeling in Marketing (using Markov Chains, with a case study in R)
 
Let's take a look at what channel attribution is and how it ties into the concept of Markov chains, explained using case study in R.
 
 
Online Learning Guide with Text Classification using Vowpal Wabbit (VW)
Online Learning Guide with Text Classification using Vowpal Wabbit (VW)
 
Take a look at the comparison between Batch Learning & Online Learning and then learn how to perform text classification using an online learning framework called Vowpal Wabbit (VW).
 
 
A Simple Introduction to ANOVA (with applications in Excel)
A Simple Introduction to ANOVA (with applications in Excel)
 
Let us begin with exploring ANOVA, its different techniques and its applications in Excel, with this comprehensive simplified guide.
 
 
Intermediate Tableau guide for data science and business intelligence professionals
Intermediate Tableau guide for data science and business intelligence professionals
 
Let's explore & learn core functionalities of Tableau which help in making really dynamic graphs - meant for Intermediats! Get started.
 
 
Introductory Guide  Factorization Machines & their application on huge datasets (with codes in Python)
Introductory Guide  Factorization Machines & their application on huge datasets (with codes in Python)
 
Let's get down to understand Factorization Machines(FM) and Field Aware Factorization Machines(FFM) & their application on huge datasets, using Python.
subject: AVbytes, Ultimate 2018 learning path and awesome contests coming up

The Young Optimization Crackerjack Contest

 
10 February - 19 February 2018
 
 
 
Register Here
 
 
Dear Hacker,

IEOR @ IITB & McKinsey Knowledge Centre India have partnered to create a challenging competition "The Young Optimization Crackerjack Contest", for students interested in Analytics. The competition is less than 3 days away.
 
Start Date: 10 Feb, 00:00 AM
End Date: 19 Feb, 11:59 PM
 
You have nine days, to solve this exciting problem of forecasting and replenishment. 
 
 
Prizes
 
Winners of the competition stand to win prizes worth rupees 1 Lakh .
 
1st Prize: Ipad pro
2nd Prize: Bose wireless headphone
3rd Prize: Kindle Oasis
 
What's more interesting is that the winners of this competition will be invited to attend the IEOR Day @ IIT Bombay. Academicians and practitioners from the industry, across domains, will come together to discuss the latest & greatest of analytics on this day.
 
Please Note: Only current full-time students (enrolled in Bachelors, Masters or PhD programs) from India are eligible for prizes. If you are an alumnus, please share this email with students enrolled in the current batches.
 
Come be a part of this hackathon.

email_body:
March 2018 Newsletter
 
Dear Avian,

2018 is getting exciting and I am finding this space limiting to the number of announcements I need to make.
 
First announcement - beta version of Analytics Vidhya Android App is going to come out shortly. If you are looking to get invited to early beta access - just RSVP to this mail. We will make sure you will be the first ones to get this access.
 
Second announcement - the hackathons are going to become bigger and better! This month we will be distributing prizes worth more than $8,000. This includes DataHack Premier League - the ultimate sports analytics competition based on IPL 2018. In addition, we are back with Mckinsey Analytics Online Hackathon - Recommendation Engine and Lord of the Machines - Data Science Hackathon . Learn, participate, hack and WIN big!
 
Third, a big thanks for making our learning path a huge success - close to 5,000 people are undergoing this and the feedback is nothing short of phenomenal. Looking at it, we have further launched Experiments with Data - an ideal place to start solving data science problems for beginners.
 
Fourth - did you check out articles on Pytorch, NLP using TextBlob, Regularized Greedy Forests (RGF) along with a list of recommended e-books for our Machine Learning enthusiasts ? Further, to keep you updated with industry happenings, we have launched AVbytes - daily information pieces about recent developments in the Data Science world. Get them delivered directly to your mailbox here.
 
Does that sound like a happening month? I bet it does. Keep Learning and leave the rest for us - we promise well bring the best resources to you.
 
Regards,
Kunal
subject: [March Newsletter] AV Android App, DataHack Premier League, AVBytes and other exciting announcements !

Hiring Data Scientists & Data Engineers?
 
 
Data science is a large, complex, multidisciplinary field with a niche (yet highly diverse) pool of talent  and finding the right talent for your organization requires a precise mix of preparation and processes.
 
 
Below are the practices which can help talent acquisition leads in hiring the RIGHT TALENT, in MINIMUM TIME, with GREATER ROI.
subject: Recruiting Data Scientists? Follow These 5 Best Practices

email_body:
McKinsey Analytics Online Hackathon
Recommendation Design
Dear Hacker,

McKinsey 24-hour hackathon goes live in 24 hours. On behalf of McKinsey Analytics, we invite you to participate in the next series of the machine learning hackathons. By participating you will have the opportunity to experience and overcome some of the challenges that leading global organizations face.
 
During this hackathon, you will apply machine learning to a recommendation system.

Prize: All-expenses paid trip to a tech conference of your choice
 
About McKinsey Analytics 
McKinsey Analytics equips clients with strategies and tools to gain meaningful insights from data and turn those into competitive advantages. We work together with global companies to make lasting improvements to their performance. We use data science, strategy, operations, implementation and change management solutions to help build analytics-driven organizations. Our teams of data scientists and data engineers work with clients to identify opportunities, assess available data, define solutions, ingest data, develop relevant algorithms and visualize outputs. 
 
The contest ends: 10 March, 23:59 (GMT)
 
Come be a part of this hackathon.
subject: 24 Hours To Go For McKinsey 24-hour Hackathon | Are you ready?
